def_en: If you describe a violent action as mindless, you mean that it is done without thought and will achieve nothing.

def_cn: 愚蠢的;无知的;不动脑子的
def_en: If you describe a person or group as mindless, you mean that they are stupid or do not think about what they are doing.

def_cn: 单调乏味的;无需动脑筋的
def_en: If you describe an activity as mindless, you mean that it is so dull that people do it or take part in it without thinking.
